title.raw: 《李將軍列傳》 Biography of General Li

sentences.zh: 李將軍廣者，隴西成紀人也。

translations.literal: General Li Guang, Longxi Chengji person.

sentences.zh: 其先曰李信，秦時為將，逐得燕太子丹者也。

translations.literal: His ancestor named Li Xin, Qin time became general, pursued captured Yan crown prince Dan.

sentences.zh: 故槐裏，徙成紀。

translations.literal: Originally Huaili, moved to Chengji.

sentences.zh: 廣家世世受射。

translations.literal: Guang family generation generation received archery.

sentences.zh: 孝文帝十四年，匈奴大入蕭關，而廣以良家子從軍擊胡，用善騎射，殺首虜多，為漢中郎。

translations.literal: Emperor Wen fourteenth year, Xiongnu greatly entered Xiaoguan, and Guang with good family son followed army attacked Hu, used good horsemanship archery, killed enemy leaders many, became Han imperial attendant.

sentences.zh: 廣從弟李蔡亦為郎，皆為武騎常侍，秩八百石。

translations.literal: Guang younger cousin Li Cai also became imperial attendant, all became martial cavalry regular attendants, rank eight hundred shi.

sentences.zh: 嘗從行，有所衝陷折關及格猛獸，而文帝曰：「惜乎，子不遇時！

translations.literal: Chang cong xing, you suo chong xian zhe guan ji ge meng shou, er Wen di yue: "Xi hu, zi bu yu shi!
translations.idiomatic: Once followed campaign, had what charged broke barriers and fought fierce beasts, and Emperor Wen said: "Pity, you not meet time!

sentences.zh: 如令子當高帝時，萬戶侯豈足道哉！」

translations.literal: Ru ling zi dang Gao di shi, wan hu hou qi zu dao zai!"
translations.idiomatic: If let you meet Gao emperor time, ten thousand households marquis how sufficient speak!"

sentences.zh: 及孝景初立，廣為隴西都尉，徙為騎郎將。

translations.literal: When Emperor Jing initially established, Guang became Longxi commandery governor, moved became cavalry captain.

sentences.zh: 吳楚軍時，廣為驍騎都尉，從太尉亞夫擊吳楚軍，取旗，顯功名昌邑下。

translations.literal: Wu Chu army time, Guang became fierce cavalry commandery governor, followed commander Ya fu attacked Wu Chu army, took flag, displayed merit fame Changyi below.

sentences.zh: 以梁王授廣將軍印，還，賞不行。

translations.literal: Because Liang wang gave Guang general seal, return, reward not carried out.

sentences.zh: 徙為上谷太守，匈奴日以合戰。

translations.literal: Moved became Shanggu governor, Xiongnu daily with engage battle.

sentences.zh: 典屬國公孫昆邪為上泣曰：「李廣才氣，天下無雙，自負其能，數與虜敵戰，恐亡之。」

translations.literal: Dian shu guo Gong sun Kun xie wei shang qi yue: "Li Guang cai qi, tian xia wu shuang, zi fu qi neng, shu yu lu di zhan, kong wang zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Director of barbarian affairs Gongsun Kunxie wept for emperor: "Li Guang talent spirit, realm without equal, self relied his ability, repeatedly with enemy engaged battle, feared lose him."

sentences.zh: 於是乃徙為上郡太守。

translations.literal: Thereupon then moved became Shangjun governor.

sentences.zh: 後廣轉為邊郡太守，徙上郡。

translations.literal: Later Guang transferred became border commandery governor, moved Shangjun.

sentences.zh: 嘗為隴西、北地、鴈門、代郡、雲中太守，皆以力戰為名。

translations.literal: Once became Longxi, Beidi, Yanmen, Daijun, Yunzhong governors, all with vigorous battle for fame.

sentences.zh: 匈奴大入上郡，天子使中貴人從廣勒習兵擊匈奴。

translations.literal: Xiongnu greatly entered Shangjun, emperor sent palace favorite followed Guang drilled practiced troops attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 中貴人將騎數十縱，見匈奴三人，與戰。

translations.literal: Palace favorite led cavalry several ten released, saw Xiongnu three people, with battle.

sentences.zh: 三人還射，傷中貴人，殺其騎且盡。

translations.literal: Three people returned shot, injured palace favorite, killed his cavalry almost all.

sentences.zh: 中貴人走廣。

translations.literal: Palace favorite fled to Guang.

sentences.zh: 廣曰：「是必射雕者也。」

translations.literal: Guang yue: "Shi bi she diao zhe ye."
translations.idiomatic: Guang said: "This must be shooting eagle ones."

sentences.zh: 廣乃遂從百騎往馳三人。

translations.literal: Guang then from hundred cavalry went galloped pursue three people.

sentences.zh: 三人亡馬步行，行數十里。

translations.literal: Three people lost horses foot walked, walked several ten li.

sentences.zh: 廣令其騎張左右翼，而廣身自射彼三人者，殺其二人，生得一人，果匈奴射雕者也。

translations.literal: Guang ordered his cavalry spread left right wings, and Guang personally shot those three people, killed their two people, alive captured one person, indeed Xiongnu shooting eagle ones.

sentences.zh: 已縛之上馬，望匈奴有數千騎，見廣，以為誘騎，皆驚，上山陳。

translations.literal: Already bound placed on horse, looked Xiongnu had several thousand cavalry, saw Guang, considered lure cavalry, all alarmed, ascended mountain arrayed.

sentences.zh: 廣之百騎皆大恐，欲馳還走。

translations.literal: Guang his hundred cavalry all greatly feared, wanted gallop return flee.

sentences.zh: 廣曰：「吾去大軍數十里，今如此以百騎走，匈奴追射我立盡。

translations.literal: Guang yue: "Wu qu da jun shu shi li, jin ru ci yi bai qi zou, Xiong nu zhui she wo li jin.
translations.idiomatic: Guang said: "I from main army several ten li, now like this with hundred cavalry flee, Xiongnu pursue shoot me immediately finish.

sentences.zh: 今我留，匈奴必以我為大軍［之］誘（之），必不敢擊我。」

translations.literal: Jin wo liu, Xiong nu bi yi wo wei da jun zhi you qi, bi bu gan ji wo."
translations.idiomatic: Now I stay, Xiongnu must consider me main army lure cavalry, must not dare attack me."

sentences.zh: 廣令諸騎曰：「前！」

translations.literal: Guang ling zhu qi yue: "Qian!"
translations.idiomatic: Guang ordered various cavalry: "Forward!"

sentences.zh: 前未到匈奴陳二里所，止，令曰：「皆下馬解鞍！」

translations.literal: Qian wei dao Xiong nu chen er li suo, zhi, ling yue: "Jie xia ma jie an!"
translations.idiomatic: Forward not arrived Xiongnu array two li place, stopped, ordered: "All dismount loosen saddles!"

sentences.zh: 其騎曰：「虜多且近，即有急，柰何？」

translations.literal: Qi qi yue: "Lu duo qie jin, ji you ji, nai he?"
translations.idiomatic: His cavalry said: "Enemy many moreover near, if have emergency, what do?"

sentences.zh: 廣曰：「彼虜以我為走，今皆解鞍以示不走，用堅其意。」

translations.literal: Guang yue: "Bi lu yi wo wei zou, jin jie jie an yi shi bu zou, yong jian qi yi."
translations.idiomatic: Guang said: "Those enemy consider me fleeing, now all loosen saddles to show not flee, use strengthen their intent."

sentences.zh: 於是胡騎遂不敢擊。

translations.literal: Thereupon Hu cavalry then not dared attack.

sentences.zh: 有白馬將出護其兵，李廣上馬與十餘騎奔射殺胡白馬將，而復還至其騎中，解鞍，令士皆縱馬臥。

translations.literal: Had white horse general out protected their troops, Li Guang mounted horse with ten remainder cavalry galloped shot killed Hu white horse general, and again returned to his cavalry middle, loosened saddles, ordered soldiers all released horses lay down.

sentences.zh: 是時會暮，胡兵終怪之，不敢擊。

translations.literal: At time met dusk, Hu troops finally wondered it, not dared attack.

sentences.zh: 夜半時，胡兵亦以為漢有伏軍於旁欲夜取之，胡皆引兵而去。

translations.literal: Midnight time, Hu troops also considered Han had ambush army at side wanted night take them, Hu all led troops left.

sentences.zh: 平旦，李廣乃歸其大軍。

translations.literal: Dawn, Li Guang then returned his main army.

sentences.zh: 大軍不知廣所之，故弗從。

translations.literal: Main army not knew Guang where went, therefore not followed.

sentences.zh: 居久之，孝景崩，武帝立，左右以為廣名將也，於是廣以上郡太守為未央衛尉，而程不識亦為長樂衛尉。

translations.literal: Resided long time, Emperor Jing passed, Emperor Wu established, attendants considered Guang famous general, thereupon Guang with Shangjun governor became Weiyang guard wei, and Cheng Bushi also became Changle guard wei.

sentences.zh: 程不識故與李廣俱以邊太守將軍屯。

translations.literal: Cheng Bushi originally with Li Guang both as border governors generals garrisoned.

sentences.zh: 及出擊胡，而廣行無部伍行陳，就善水草屯，舍止，人人自便，不擊刀鬬以自衛，莫府省約文書籍事，然亦遠斥候，未嘗遇害。

translations.literal: When out attacked Hu, and Guang marched without divisions rows arrayed, approached good water grass garrisoned, resided stopped, people each self convenient, not beat drums fought to self defend, headquarters office reduced simplified documents books matters, but also far sent scouts, never encountered harm.

sentences.zh: 程不識正部曲行伍營陳，擊刀鬬，士吏治軍簿至明，軍不得休息，然亦未嘗遇害。

translations.literal: Cheng Bushi corrected divisions rows arrayed garrisoned, beat drums fought, officers officials managed army registers to dawn, army not got rest, but also never encountered harm.

sentences.zh: 不識曰：「李廣軍極簡易，然虜卒犯之，無以禁也；

translations.literal: Bu shi yue: "Li Guang jun ji jian yi, ran lu cu fan zhi, wu yi jin ye;
translations.idiomatic: Bushen said: "Li Guang army extremely simple easy, but enemy suddenly violate it, nothing to prohibit;

sentences.zh: 而其士卒亦佚樂，咸樂為之死。

translations.literal: And his soldiers also relaxed happy, all happy for him die.

sentences.zh: 我軍雖煩擾，然虜亦不得犯我。」

translations.literal: Wo jun sui fan rao, ran lu yi bu de fan wo."
translations.idiomatic: My army though troublesome, but enemy also not able violate me."

sentences.zh: 是時漢邊郡李廣、程不識皆為名將，然匈奴畏李廣之略，士卒亦多樂從李廣而苦程不識。

translations.literal: At time Han border commanderies Li Guang, Cheng Bushi all were famous generals, but Xiongnu feared Li Guang strategy, soldiers also many happy followed Li Guang but suffered Cheng Bushi.

sentences.zh: 程不識孝景時以數直諫為太中大夫。

translations.literal: Cheng Bushi Emperor Jing time with repeatedly straight advised became palace grand master.

sentences.zh: 為人廉，謹於文法。

translations.literal: As person incorrupt, careful with written law.

sentences.zh: 後漢以馬邑城誘單于，使大軍伏馬邑旁谷，而廣為驍騎將軍，領屬護軍將軍。

translations.literal: Later Han with Maiyi city lured chanyu, sent main army ambushed Maiyi side valley, and Guang became fierce cavalry general, led belonged protect army general.

sentences.zh: 是時單于覺之，去，漢軍皆無功。

translations.literal: At time chanyu aware it, left, Han army all no merit.

sentences.zh: 其後四歲，廣以衛尉為將軍，出鴈門擊匈奴。

translations.literal: Its after four years, Guang with guard wei became general, out Yanmen attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 匈奴兵多，破敗廣軍，生得廣。

translations.literal: Xiongnu troops many, broke defeated Guang army, alive captured Guang.

sentences.zh: 單于素聞廣賢，令曰：「得李廣必生致之。」

translations.literal: Chan yu su wen Guang xian, ling yue: "De Li Guang bi sheng zhi zhi."
translations.idiomatic: Chanyu long heard Guang worthy, ordered: "Get Li Guang must alive bring him."

sentences.zh: 胡騎得廣，廣時傷病，置廣兩馬閒，絡而盛臥廣。

translations.literal: Hu cavalry got Guang, Guang at time injured ill, placed Guang two horses between, netted and wrapped lay Guang.

sentences.zh: 行十餘里，廣詳死，睨其旁有一胡兒騎善馬，廣暫騰而上胡兒馬，因推墮兒，取其弓，鞭馬南馳數十里，復得其餘軍，因引而入塞。

translations.literal: Walked ten remainder li, Guang pretended dead, glanced his side had one Hu boy rode good horse, Guang temporarily sprang ascended Hu boy horse, because pushed fell boy, took his bow, whipped horse south galloped several ten li, again got his remaining army, because led entered pass.

sentences.zh: 匈奴捕者騎數百追之，廣行取胡兒弓，射殺追騎，以故得脫。

translations.literal: Xiongnu catchers several hundred pursued him, Guang walking took Hu boy bow, shot killed pursuing cavalry, therefore got escape.

sentences.zh: 於是至漢，漢下廣吏。

translations.literal: Thereupon arrived Han, Han sent Guang to officials.

sentences.zh: 吏當廣所失亡多，為虜所生得，當斬，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Officials judged Guang what lost perished many, by enemy alive captured, should behead, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 頃之，家居數歲。

translations.literal: Short time, resided home several years.

sentences.zh: 廣家與故潁陰侯孫屏野居藍田南山中射獵。

translations.literal: Guang home with former Yingyin marquis grandson Pingye resided Lantian south mountain middle shot hunted.

sentences.zh: 嘗夜從一騎出，從人田間飲。

translations.literal: Once night from one cavalry out, followed people field between drank.

sentences.zh: 還至霸陵亭，霸陵尉醉，呵止廣。

translations.literal: Returned to Baling pavilion, Baling wei drunk, shouted stopped Guang.

sentences.zh: 廣騎曰：「故李將軍。」

translations.literal: Guang qi yue: "Gu Li jiang jun."
translations.idiomatic: Guang cavalry said: "Former Li general."

sentences.zh: 尉曰：「今將軍尚不得夜行，何乃故也！」

translations.literal: Wei yue: "Jin jiang jun shang bu de ye xing, he nai gu ye!"
translations.idiomatic: Wei said: "Now general still not able night travel, why moreover former!"

sentences.zh: 止廣宿亭下。

translations.literal: Stopped Guang stayed pavilion below.

sentences.zh: 居無何，匈奴入殺遼西太守，敗韓將軍，後韓將軍徙右北平。

translations.literal: Resided no long, Xiongnu entered killed Liaoxi governor, defeated Han general, after Han general moved right Beiping.

sentences.zh: 於是天子乃召拜廣為右北平太守。

translations.literal: Thereupon emperor then summoned appointed Guang as right Beiping governor.

sentences.zh: 廣即請霸陵尉與俱，至軍而斬之。

translations.literal: Guang immediately requested Baling wei with together go, arrived army and beheaded him.

sentences.zh: 廣居右北平，匈奴聞之，號曰「漢之飛將軍」，避之數歲，不敢入右北平。

translations.literal: Guang ju you bei ping, Xiong nu wen zhi, hao yue "Han zhi fei jiang jun", bi zhi shu sui, bu gan ru you bei ping.
translations.idiomatic: Guang resided right Beiping, Xiongnu heard it, called "Han flying general", avoided him several years, not dared enter right Beiping.

sentences.zh: 廣出獵，見草中石，以為虎而射之，中石沒鏃，視之石也。

translations.literal: Guang out hunted, saw grass middle stone, considered tiger and shot it, hit stone buried arrowhead, looked it stone.

sentences.zh: 因復更射之，終不能復入石矣。

translations.literal: Because again moreover shot it, finally not able again enter stone.

sentences.zh: 廣所居郡聞有虎，嘗自射之。

translations.literal: Guang what resided commandery heard had tiger, often self shot it.

sentences.zh: 及居右北平射虎，虎騰傷廣，廣亦竟射殺之。

translations.literal: When resided right Beiping shot tiger, tiger sprang injured Guang, Guang also finally shot killed it.

sentences.zh: 廣廉，得賞賜輒分其麾下，飲食與士共之。

translations.literal: Guang incorrupt, got reward granted then distributed his command below, drank ate with soldiers shared.

sentences.zh: 終廣之身，為二千石四十餘年，家無餘財，終不言家產事。

translations.literal: Finally Guang lifetime, as two thousand shi forty remainder years, home without surplus wealth, finally not spoke home property matters.

sentences.zh: 廣為人長，猨臂，其善射亦天性也，雖其子孫他人學者，莫能及廣。

translations.literal: Guang as person tall, ape arms, his good shooting also natural talent, though his sons grandsons other people learned, none able match Guang.

sentences.zh: 廣訥口少言，與人居則畫地為軍陳，射闊狹以飲。

translations.literal: Guang slow mouth few words, with people resided then drew ground as army array, shot wide narrow to drink.

sentences.zh: 專以射為戲，竟死。

translations.literal: Specialized with shooting as game, finally died.

sentences.zh: 廣之將兵，乏絕之處，見水，士卒不盡飲，廣不近水，士卒不盡食，廣不嘗食。

translations.literal: Guang led troops, exhausted places, saw water, soldiers not all drank, Guang not approached water, soldiers not all ate, Guang not tasted food.

sentences.zh: 寬緩不苛，士以此愛樂為用。

translations.literal: Lenient relaxed not harsh, soldiers with this loved happy for use.

sentences.zh: 其射，見敵急，非在數十步之內，度不中不發，發即應弦而倒。

translations.literal: His shooting, saw enemy urgent, not in several ten steps within, measured not hit not fired, fired then responded string fell.

sentences.zh: 用此，其將兵數困辱，其射猛獸亦為所傷云。

translations.literal: Used this, his led troops repeatedly trapped humiliated, his shot fierce beasts also by injured they say.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，石建卒，於是上召廣代建為郎中令。

translations.literal: Resided short time, Shi Jian died, thereupon emperor summoned Guang replaced Jian became palace secretary.

sentences.zh: 元朔六年，廣復為後將軍，從大將軍軍出定襄，擊匈奴。

translations.literal: Yuanshuo sixth year, Guang again became rear general, followed grand general army out Dingxiang, attacked Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 諸將多中首虜率，以功為侯者，而廣軍無功。

translations.literal: Various generals many hit enemy leaders rates, with merit became marquises, but Guang army no merit.

sentences.zh: 後二歲，廣以郎中令將四千騎出右北平，博望侯張騫將萬騎與廣俱，異道。

translations.literal: After two years, Guang with palace secretary led four thousand cavalry out right Beiping, Bowang marquis Zhang Qian led ten thousand cavalry with Guang together, different roads.

sentences.zh: 行可數百里，匈奴左賢王將四萬騎圍廣，廣軍士皆恐，廣乃使其子敢往馳之。

translations.literal: Marched could several hundred li, Xiongnu left worthy king led four ten thousand cavalry surrounded Guang, Guang army soldiers all feared, Guang then sent his son Gan go galloped them.

sentences.zh: 敢獨與數十騎馳，直貫胡騎，出其左右而還，告廣曰：「胡虜易與耳。」

translations.literal: Gan du yu shu shi qi chi, zhi guan Hu qi, chu qi zuo you er huan, gao Guang yue: "Hu lu yi yu er."
translations.idiomatic: Gan alone with several ten cavalry galloped, straight penetrated Hu cavalry, out their left right returned, told Guang: "Hu enemy easy with."

sentences.zh: 軍士乃安。

translations.literal: Army soldiers then calm.

sentences.zh: 廣為圜陳外向，胡急擊之，矢下如雨。

translations.literal: Guang made circular array outward facing, Hu urgently attacked it, arrows fell like rain.

sentences.zh: 漢兵死者過半，漢矢且盡。

translations.literal: Han troops died over half, Han arrows almost exhausted.

sentences.zh: 廣乃令士持滿毋發，而廣身自以大黃射其裨將，殺數人，胡虜益解。

translations.literal: Guang then ordered soldiers hold full not fire, and Guang personally with big yellow shot their deputy generals, killed several people, Hu enemy increasingly loosened.

sentences.zh: 會日暮，吏士皆無人色，而廣意氣自如，益治軍。

translations.literal: Met dusk, officers soldiers all without human color, but Guang spirit energy self like, increasingly governed army.

sentences.zh: 軍中自是服其勇也。

translations.literal: Army middle from this submitted his courage.

sentences.zh: 明日，復力戰，而博望侯軍亦至，匈奴軍乃解去。

translations.literal: Next day, again vigorously fought, and Bowang marquis army also arrived, Xiongnu army then withdrew left.

sentences.zh: 漢軍罷，弗能追。

translations.literal: Han army dismissed, not able pursue.

sentences.zh: 是時廣軍幾沒，罷歸。

translations.literal: At time Guang army almost perished, dismissed returned.

sentences.zh: 漢法，博望侯留遲後期，當死，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: Han law, Bowang marquis stayed late after period, should die, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 廣軍功自如，無賞。

translations.literal: Guang army merit self like, no reward.

sentences.zh: 初，廣之從弟李蔡與廣俱事孝文帝。

translations.literal: Initially, Guang younger cousin Li Cai with Guang together served Emperor Wen.

sentences.zh: 景帝時，蔡積功勞至二千石。

translations.literal: Emperor Jing time, Cai accumulated merit labor to two thousand shi.

sentences.zh: 孝武帝時，至代相。

translations.literal: Emperor Wu time, to Dai chancellor.

sentences.zh: 以元朔五年為輕車將車，從大將軍擊右賢王，有功中率，封為樂安侯。

translations.literal: With Yuanshuo fifth year became light chariot general, followed grand general attacked right worthy king, had merit hit rate, sealed as Lean hou.

sentences.zh: 元狩二年中，代公孫弘為丞相。

translations.literal: Yuanshou second year middle, replaced Gongsun Hong became chancellor.

sentences.zh: 蔡為人在下中，名聲出廣下甚遠，然廣不得爵邑，官不過九卿，而蔡為列侯，位至三公。

translations.literal: Cai as person in lower middle, fame reputation out Guang below very far, but Guang not got nobility fief, office not passed nine ministers, but Cai became marquises, position to three dukes.

sentences.zh: 諸廣之軍吏及士卒或取封侯。

translations.literal: Various Guang army officers and soldiers or took sealed marquises.

sentences.zh: 廣嘗與望氣王朔燕語，曰：「自漢擊匈奴而廣未嘗不在其中，而諸部校尉以下，才能不及中人，然以擊胡軍功取侯者數十人，而廣不為後人，然無尺寸之功以得封邑者，何也？

translations.literal: Guang chang yu wang qi Wang Shuo Yan yu, yue: "Zi Han ji Xiong nu er Guang wei chang bu zai qi zhong, er zhu bu xiao wei yi xia, cai neng bu ji zhong ren, ran yi ji Hu jun gong qu hou zhe shu shi ren, er Guang bu wei hou ren, ran wu chi cun zhi gong yi de feng yi zhe, he ye?
translations.idiomatic: Guang once with fortune teller Wang Shuo Yan talked, said: "Since Han attacked Xiongnu and Guang never not in among them, but various commandery colonels below, abilities not match middle people, but with attacked Hu army merit took marquises several ten people, but Guang not became marquis person, but without inch merit to get sealed fief, why?

sentences.zh: 豈吾相不當侯邪？

translations.literal: Qi wu xiang bu dang hou xie?
translations.idiomatic: How my appearance not should marquis?

sentences.zh: 且固命也？」

translations.literal: Qie gu ming ye?"
translations.idiomatic: Moreover firmly fate?

sentences.zh: 朔曰：「將軍自念，豈嘗有所恨乎？」

translations.literal: Shuo yue: "Jiang jun zi nian, qi chang you suo hen hu?"
translations.idiomatic: Shuo said: "General self reflect, how once had what regret?"

sentences.zh: 廣曰：「吾嘗為隴西守，羌嘗反，吾誘而降，降者八百餘人，吾詐而同日殺之。

translations.literal: Guang yue: "Wu chang wei Long xi shou, Qiang chang fan, wu you er xiang, xiang zhe ba bai yu ren, wu zha er tong ri sha zhi.
translations.idiomatic: Guang said: "I once as Longxi governor, Qiang once rebelled, I lured and surrendered, surrendered eight hundred remainder people, I deceived and same day killed them.

sentences.zh: 至今大恨獨此耳。」

translations.literal: Zhi jin da hen du ci er."
translations.idiomatic: Until now big regret only this.

sentences.zh: 朔曰：「禍莫大於殺已降，此乃將軍所以不得侯者也。」

translations.literal: Shuo yue: "Huo mo da yu sha yi xiang, ci nai jiang jun suo yi bu de hou zhe ye."
translations.idiomatic: Shuo said: "Calamity not greater than kill already surrendered, this namely general so not get marquis.

sentences.zh: 後二歲，大將軍、驃騎將軍大出擊匈奴，廣數自請行。

translations.literal: After two years, grand general, flying cavalry general greatly out attacked Xiongnu, Guang repeatedly self requested go.

sentences.zh: 天子以為老，弗許；

translations.literal: Tian zi yi wei lao, fu xu;
translations.idiomatic: Emperor considered old, not permitted;

sentences.zh: 良久乃許之，以為前將軍。

translations.literal: Long time then permitted him, appointed as front general.

sentences.zh: 是歲，元狩四年也。

translations.literal: This year, Yuanshou fourth year.

sentences.zh: 廣既從大將軍青擊匈奴，既出塞，青捕虜知單于所居，乃自以精兵走之，而令廣并於右將軍軍，出東道。

translations.literal: Guang already followed grand general Qing attacked Xiongnu, already out pass, Qing captured captives knew chanyu residence, then self with elite troops went it, and ordered Guang merged with right general army, out east road.

sentences.zh: 東道少回遠，而大軍行水草少，其勢不屯行。

translations.literal: East road few winding distant, but main army marched water grass few, its situation not garrison march.

sentences.zh: 廣自請曰：「臣部為前將軍，今大將軍乃徙令臣出東道，且臣結發而與匈奴戰，今乃一得當單于，臣願居前，先死單于。」

translations.literal: Guang zi qing yue: "Chen bu wei qian jiang jun, jin da jiang jun nai xu ling chen chu dong dao, qie chen jie fa er yu Xiong nu zhan, jin nai yi de dang chan yu, chen yuan ju qian, xian si chan yu."
translations.idiomatic: Guang self requested: "Subject command as front general, now grand general then moved ordered subject out east road, moreover subject tied hair and with Xiongnu fought, now then once got face chanyu, subject wish reside front, first die chanyu."

sentences.zh: 大將軍青亦陰受上誡，以為李廣老，數奇，毋令當單于，恐不得所欲。

translations.literal: Grand general Qing also secretly received emperor instruction, considered Li Guang old, repeatedly unlucky, not let face chanyu, feared not get desired.

sentences.zh: 而是時公孫敖新失侯，為中將軍從大將軍，大將軍亦欲使敖與俱當單于，故徙前將軍廣。

translations.literal: And at time Gongsun Ao newly lost marquis, became middle general followed grand general, grand general also wanted make Ao with together face chanyu, therefore moved front general Guang.

sentences.zh: 廣時知之，固自辭於大將軍。

translations.literal: Guang at time knew it, firmly self declined with grand general.

sentences.zh: 大將軍不聽，令長史封書與廣之莫府，曰：「急詣部，如書。」

translations.literal: Da jiang jun bu ting, ling chang shi feng shu yu Guang zhi mo fu, yue: "Ji yi bu, ru shu."
translations.idiomatic: Grand general not listened, ordered chancellor secretary sealed letter to Guang headquarters, said: "Urgently go to command, like letter."

sentences.zh: 廣不謝大將軍而起行，意甚慍怒而就部，引兵與右將軍食其合軍出東道。

translations.literal: Guang not thanked grand general and rose marched, intent very resentful angered and went command, led troops with right general Shiqi combined army out east road.

sentences.zh: 軍亡導，或失道，後大將軍。

translations.literal: Army lacked guide, or lost road, after grand general.

sentences.zh: 大將軍與單于接戰，單于遁走，弗能得而還。

translations.literal: Grand general with chanyu engaged battle, chanyu fled ran, not able get and returned.

sentences.zh: 南絕幕，遇前將軍、右將軍。

translations.literal: South cut off tent, met front general, right general.

sentences.zh: 廣已見大將軍，還入軍。

translations.literal: Guang already saw grand general, returned entered army.

sentences.zh: 大將軍使長史持糒醪遺廣，因問廣、食其失道狀，青欲上書報天子軍曲折。

translations.literal: Grand general sent chancellor secretary held dried grains wine gifted Guang, because asked Guang, Shiqi lost road condition, Qing wanted memorial reported emperor army twists turns.

sentences.zh: 廣未對，大將軍使長史急責廣之幕府對簿。

translations.literal: Guang not responded, grand general sent chancellor secretary urgently blamed Guang headquarters respond trial.

sentences.zh: 廣曰：「諸校尉無罪，乃我自失道。

translations.literal: Guang yue: "Zhu xiao wei wu zui, nai wo zi shi dao.
translations.idiomatic: Guang said: "Various colonels no crime, namely I self lost road.

sentences.zh: 吾今自上簿。」

translations.literal: Wu jin zi shang bu."
translations.idiomatic: I now self go up trial.

sentences.zh: 至莫府，廣謂其麾下曰；

translations.literal: Zhi mo fu, Guang wei qi hui xia yue;
translations.idiomatic: Arrived headquarters, Guang told his command below said;

sentences.zh: 「廣結發與匈奴大小七十餘戰，今幸從大將軍出接單于兵，而大將軍又徙廣部行回遠，而又迷失道，豈非天哉！

translations.literal: "Guang jie fa yu Xiong nu da xiao qi shi yu zhan, jin xing cong da jiang jun chu jie chan yu bing, er da jiang jun you xu Guang bu xing hui yuan, er you mi shi dao, qi fei tian zai!
translations.idiomatic: "Guang tied hair with Xiongnu big small seventy remainder battles, now fortunately followed grand general out engaged chanyu troops, but grand general moreover moved Guang command march winding distant, and moreover confused lost road, how not heaven!

sentences.zh: 且廣年六十餘矣，終不能復對刀筆之吏。」

translations.literal: Qie Guang nian liu shi yu yi, zhong bu neng fu dui dao bi zhi li."
translations.idiomatic: Moreover Guang age sixty remainder, finally not able again face sword brush officials.

sentences.zh: 遂引刀自剄。

translations.literal: Then drew knife self cut throat.

sentences.zh: 廣軍士大夫一軍皆哭。

translations.literal: Guang army scholar officials one army all cried.

sentences.zh: 百姓聞之，知與不知，無老壯皆為垂涕。

translations.literal: Common people heard it, knew and not knew, without old strong all for hung tears.

sentences.zh: 而右將軍獨下吏，當死，贖為庶人。

translations.literal: But right general alone sent officials, should die, redeemed as commoner.

sentences.zh: 廣子三人，曰當戶、椒、敢，為郎。

translations.literal: Guang sons three people, named Danghu, Jiao, Gan, became imperial attendants.

sentences.zh: 天子與韓嫣戲，嫣少不遜，當戶擊嫣，嫣走。

translations.literal: Emperor with Han Yan played, Yan young not respectful, Danghu hit Yan, Yan fled.

sentences.zh: 於是天子以為勇。

translations.literal: Thereupon emperor considered brave.

sentences.zh: 當戶早死，拜椒為代郡太守，皆先廣死。

translations.literal: Danghu early died, appointed Jiao as Daijun governor, all before Guang died.

sentences.zh: 當戶有遺腹子名陵。

translations.literal: Danghu had posthumous son named Ling.

sentences.zh: 廣死軍時，敢從驃騎將軍。

translations.literal: Guang died army time, Gan followed flying cavalry general.

sentences.zh: 廣死明年，李蔡以丞相坐侵孝景園壖地，當下吏治，蔡亦自殺，不對獄，國除。

translations.literal: Guang died next year, Li Cai with chancellor sat encroached Emperor Jing garden wall land, should sent officials treated, Cai also suicide, not responded prison, fief removed.

sentences.zh: 李敢以校尉從驃騎將軍擊胡左賢王，力戰，奪左賢王鼓旗，斬首多，賜爵關內侯，食邑二百戶，代廣為郎中令。

translations.literal: Li Gan with colonel followed flying cavalry general attacked Hu left worthy king, vigorously fought, took left worthy king drum flags, beheaded heads many, granted nobility Guannei hou, ate fief two hundred households, replaced Guang became palace secretary.

sentences.zh: 頃之，怨大將軍青之恨其父，乃擊傷大將軍，大將軍匿諱之。

translations.literal: Short time, resented grand general Qing hated his father, then hit injured grand general, grand general hid covered it.

sentences.zh: 居無何，敢從上雍，至甘泉宮獵。

translations.literal: Resided no long, Gan followed emperor Yong, arrived Ganquan palace hunted.

sentences.zh: 驃騎將軍去病與青有親，射殺敢。

translations.literal: Flying cavalry general Huo Qubing with Qing had relation, shot killed Gan.

sentences.zh: 去病時方貴幸，上諱云鹿觸殺之。

translations.literal: Qubing at time just noble favored, emperor hid said deer bumped killed him.

sentences.zh: 居歲餘，去病死。

translations.literal: Resided year remainder, Qubing died.

sentences.zh: 而敢有女為太子中人，愛幸，敢男禹有寵於太子，然好利，李氏陵遲衰微矣。

translations.literal: But Gan had daughter as crown prince middle person, loved favored, Gan son Yu had favor with crown prince, but liked profit, Li clan Ling declined weakened.

sentences.zh: 李陵既壯，選為建章監，監諸騎。

translations.literal: Li Ling already grown, selected became Jianzhang monitor, monitored various cavalry.

sentences.zh: 善射，愛士卒。

translations.literal: Good shooting, loved soldiers.

sentences.zh: 天子以為李氏世將，而使將八百騎。

translations.literal: Emperor considered Li clan world generals, and made lead eight hundred cavalry.

sentences.zh: 嘗深入匈奴二千餘里，過居延視地形，無所見虜而還。

translations.literal: Once deeply entered Xiongnu two thousand remainder li, passed Juyan viewed terrain, nothing saw enemy returned.

sentences.zh: 拜為騎都尉，將丹陽楚人五千人，教射酒泉、張掖以屯衛胡。

translations.literal: Appointed became cavalry commandery governor, led Danyang Chu people five thousand people, taught shooting Jiuquan, Zhangye to garrison guard Hu.

sentences.zh: 數歲，天漢二年秋，貳師將軍李廣利將三萬騎擊匈奴右賢王於祁連天山，而使陵將其射士步兵五千人出居延北可千餘里，欲以分匈奴兵，毋令專走貳師也。

translations.literal: Several years, Tianhan second year autumn, Ershi general Li Guangli led three ten thousand cavalry attacked Xiongnu right worthy king at Qilian Tianshan, and made Ling lead his archers infantry five thousand people out Juyan north could thousand remainder li, wanted with divide Xiongnu troops, not let specialize run Ershi.

sentences.zh: 陵既至期還，而單于以兵八萬圍擊陵軍。

translations.literal: Ling already arrived period returned, but chanyu with troops eight ten thousand surrounded attacked Ling army.

sentences.zh: 陵軍五千人，兵矢既盡，士死者過半，而所殺傷匈奴亦萬餘人。

translations.literal: Ling army five thousand people, troops arrows already exhausted, soldiers died over half, and what killed wounded Xiongnu also ten thousand remainder people.

sentences.zh: 且引且戰，連鬬八日，還未到居延百餘里，匈奴遮狹絕道，陵食乏而救兵不到，虜急擊招降陵。

translations.literal: Pulling led fighting, continuously battled eight days, returned not arrived Juyan hundred remainder li, Xiongnu blocked narrow cut off road, Ling food exhausted and rescue troops not arrived, enemy urgently attacked summoned surrender Ling.

sentences.zh: 陵曰：「無面目報陛下。」

translations.literal: Ling yue: "Wu mian mu bao bixia."
translations.idiomatic: Ling said: "No face repay your majesty."

sentences.zh: 遂降匈奴。

translations.literal: Then surrendered Xiongnu.

sentences.zh: 其兵盡沒，餘亡散得歸漢者四百餘人。

translations.literal: His troops all perished, remaining fled scattered got return Han four hundred remainder people.

sentences.zh: 單于既得陵，素聞其家聲，及戰又壯，乃以其女妻陵而貴之。

translations.literal: Chanyu already got Ling, long heard his family reputation, and battle moreover brave, then with his daughter married Ling and honored him.

sentences.zh: 漢聞，族陵母妻子。

translations.literal: Han heard, executed Ling mother wife children.

sentences.zh: 自是之後，李氏名敗，而隴西之士居門下者皆用為恥焉。

translations.literal: From this after, Li clan name failed, but Longxi scholars resided gate below all used as shame.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：傳曰：「其身正，不令而行；

translations.literal: Tai shi gong yue: Zhuan yue: "Qi shen zheng, bu ling er xing;
translations.idiomatic: Grand Scribe said: Tradition says: "His person correct, not command and goes;

sentences.zh: 其身不正，雖令不從。」

translations.literal: Qi shen bu zheng, sui ling bu cong."
translations.idiomatic: His person not correct, though command not follows."

sentences.zh: 其李將軍之謂也？

translations.literal: Qi Li jiang jun zhi wei ye?
translations.idiomatic: This Li general what called?

sentences.zh: 余睹李將軍悛悛如鄙人，口不能道辭。

translations.literal: I observed Li general honest like common person, mouth not able speak words.

sentences.zh: 及死之日，天下知與不知，皆為盡哀。

translations.literal: When died day, realm knew and not knew, all for exhausted sorrow.

sentences.zh: 彼其忠實心誠信於士大夫也？

translations.literal: Bi qi zhong shi xin cheng xin yu shi da fu ye?
translations.idiomatic: That his loyal solid heart sincere trustworthy with scholar officials?

sentences.zh: 諺曰「桃李不言，下自成蹊」。

translations.literal: Yan yue "tao li bu yan, xia zi cheng xi".
translations.idiomatic: Proverb says "peach plum not speak, below self forms path".

sentences.zh: 此言雖小，可以諭大也。

translations.literal: This words though small, can illustrate great.
